Cool, Ill have a listen to that. Im based in the UK and I go to various poi=
nts where there may be a long history of something happening and still ener=
gy around. Edinburgh Castle was a success but had plenty of sad and angry v=
oices coming through. and even the tower of london. each time I go to a tou=
r of some sort I tend to take my recorder and see if I can pick up anything=
.. sometimes I dont, Sometimes they can be friendly.

Keep up the good work=
 :-) 




________________________________
From: James W. Hyslope <clockdry=
ve@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, 26 June, 2009 3:58:=
22
Subject: [EVP-ITC] recorder is fine





After telling it to leave I hav=
en't noticed any problems. I ran an unusually long recording today (17 minu=
tes) without a problem. Got a few EVP's but not enough voice to understand =
anything. But I am sure all is well. Not having much luck during this heat =
:) I am uploading the file called "recorder malfunction" it is rather large=
 902kb so will erase real soon. BEWARE: at 10 second mark it gets very LOUD=
!! When he starts messing with it I guess.. Then he has some noise spikes l=
ater in the recording that are not as loud.. As for his VOICE....it is in t=
he file called "get out of my face" in "Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's" at the files l=
ocation. The voice was found in the 3rd recording attempt out in the countr=
y....it was at the begining around the 5 second mark. --- In EVP-ITC@yahoog=
roups .com, eamonn mgherbi <eamonnmgherbi@ ....> wrote:
>
> wow, cant wait =
to hear that, has anything happened since you asked the man to leave, any p=
roblems with the recorder?
> 
> 
> 
> ____________ _________ _________ __
>=
 From: April Abercrombie <april@...>
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
> Sent:=
 Thursday, 25 June, 2009 14:33:22
> Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] sometimes they g=
et you while your coming AND going :)
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Bummer!
> 
> ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
> >From: James W. Hyslope 
> >To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroup=
s .com 
> >Sent: Wednesday, June 24, 2009 8:46 PM
> >Subject: [EVP-ITC] som=
etimes they get you while your coming AND going :)
> >
> >
> >I went out to=
 record today out in country. Was about 3 miles out-have recorded here befo=
re (Vandelia). This time my recorder was acting up (DR60). The REC led indi=
cator would flash sometimes (supposed to remain steady) and I would notice =
that the timer would stay in place for sometimes 5 seconds before it would =
change up one number....I though I had broken it somehow. I did hear lots o=
f LOUD splatter noises on playback while in the field. My battery indicator=
 showed 2 of 3 bars, but I went in to town and got fresh AAA's anyway.. I t=
hen went to water trough and the flashing still happened for 2 recordings h=
ere. I then said for the "bad guy" to leave and stop messing with my record=
er. Well then on my 3rd attempt....recorder started working fine. After I f=
inished the 3rd recording I packed up and went to the fairgrounds (just a s=
pur of the moment) *I thought..... so at fairgrounds I recorded for a littl=
e over 10 minutes (I stopped at an old -church/school/
> courthouse- (singl=
e room log cabin-multiple uses back then) that was used in Debuke Iowa duri=
ng 1823 (think was date). And I also asked questions around 2 other reconst=
ructed buildings from long ago. Well I got home....when my recorder was act=
ing up in country I find a Male evp say "Get Out Of My Face". I think he wa=
s guy messing with my recorder.... ....Then while at the water trough (reco=
rder still acting up even with 2 new batteries) I finally get it to work (a=
fter telling what I think followed me "to leave"). At the end of my last re=
cording (the good one) from this water trough, I hear a little girl say "co=
me to the fair....someone said" ***So I didn't go to the fairgrounds uninvi=
ted*** I just decided to go for know reason I had guessed. Well what I am s=
o "disturbed" about now......... is that while I was playing these other re=
cordings I ACCIDENTALLY- ERASED my 10 plus minutes of recording from fairgr=
ounds BEFORE I even got a chance to listen or
> download it. OOOoooowwww! !=
! :) Makes me mad. No telling what could have been on there. I was INVITED>=
>>>shucks! ! I will upload the "get out of my face" as the little girl is w=
ay to quite to hear. The guy is not so quite-but is still LOW audio. I don'=
t want him playing with my recorder anymore :/
> >
> >
>
